title: Unsafe Pricing at Any Scale
summary: I'm exiting the "serverless" Jamstack hosting space.  It's served me well and I've been able to build fun websites utilizing them.  I mean, automatic deploys, branch-based staging instances, and server-side rendering are all excellent things that I think everyone should have access to...

title: A Note on “AI” Art and My Book Covers
summary: Well, Goddamnit, it looks like some “AI”-generated art got onto one of my covers, specifically, the cover to the Italian edition of Starter Villain.  Some (actual human) artists tracked down the cover art, and (on Adobe’s stock art site, at least), it’s marked as “generated with AI. ” It’s my policy not to accept AI-generated art […]

title: BIG Things I Like
summary:
Following on from Martin’s post about, Tiny Things I Like, I thought to do my version and then I thought, why not go big, after all, I’m a BIG kinda Gal.  So here we go:
BIG Things I Like

Beds
Cups of tea
Breakfasts
Newspapers
Books
Couches

BIG things I don’t like

Crowds
Personalities
Egos
Cities
Airports
Events

And you, what tiny or BIG things do you like. 
#Life #Lists
